entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 5 April 2023
